* [![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/b85ba8771f258e7acba697179eb3a401?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](https://www.cityofcisco.com/photo-credits.html "City of Cisco, South, photographer Carla Hargrove")

![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/8259c8536ac568ae5ee437a9c3037ea8?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)

#### The City of Cisco has started construction on the Wastewater System Improvements project through the Clean Water State Revolving Fund (CWSRF) administered by the Texas Water Development Board.  Funded in whole by CWSRF, the project includes the construction of the Wastewater Treatment Plant and Humbletown Lift Station . The City of Cisco will construct a new Wastewater Treatment Plant through the Clean Water State Revolving Fund (CWSRF) administered by the Texas Water Development Board.  The new Wastewater Treatment Plant will be constructed near the existing Wastewater Treatment Plant and will serve the entire City of Cisco.

​

### Cisco City Council

Council Place II--Glenn Boles                         Council Place V--Chris Johnson

Council Place III--Sherrie Anaya                     Council Place VI--Travis Toof

![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/3acdcbf0b231ff45fbb092b2f2dbca7a?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)

**Monday, Wednesday, & Friday:**12:30pm - 4:30pm  
**Saturdays:**8:30am - 4:30pm  
  
DURING PERIODS OF INCLEMENT WEATHER THE CONVENIENCE STATION WILL NOT BE OPEN.  CONTACT CITY HALL BEFOREHAND IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO VERIFY IF THE STATION IS OPEN OR CLOSED DUE TO WEATHER CONDITIONS.

![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/44be0f70a58df271a1319b3f4adcf8f6?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)

**City Offices will be closed February 16, 2026, in observance of President's Day.**

[Click here for map, costs, and more details](http://www.cityofcisco.com/convenience-station.html)
